abstract.t: There is considerable confusion surrounding authentication stylesand the nature of the resulting trust. This paper is an attempt todevelop categories of authentication methods and present examples ofeach. In so doing, it develops an Authentication FunctionalLayering Model. It will look at the components of authentication,the flows, channels, algorithms, and entities. The taxonomypresented here is new; it has been created to facilitate discussionand understanding. Only two-party authentications are presentedhere.
